channel.title: Cookies on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Cookies on Family Recipes

item.title: Cheesecake Thumbprint Cookies
item.description: Ingredients For the cheesecake filling 4 ounces cream cheese, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/8 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 1 1/2 teaspoons sour cream 1/4 teaspoon vanilla For the cookie dough 16 tablespoons (1 cup) unsalted butter, softened 1/4 cup granulated sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 large egg yolk 2 cups all-purpose flour Recipe In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until light and fluffy. Beat in sugar and salt until smooth.
